website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, rust-free, and easy to adjust, this balance bike grows with your child all the way from toddler to kindergartener.
pros: Wide seat and handlebar adjustment lets bike grow with your child from 18 months to five years
Features soft grips, a super comfy seat, and flat-free foam rubber tires
cons: More expensive than other balance bikes

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bike. It took literally less than 10 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike. It took literally less than 10 minutes to assemble and have the kids riding it. I got it for my grandson's birthday. It was the toy that he wanted to play with most at the birthday party. When he fell, it was easy for him to pick the bike back up. The next morning he woke his parents up early wanting to ride the bike. It is definitely one of his very favorite toys. When the family goes out of town, it is easy for them to take on the trip. The bike is sturdy and comes with a life time warranty. We are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 2 yr old grandson. Another reviewer said they put the bike together in about 10 minutes with no screaming or swearing. My husband pulled the bike out of the box, I only turned my back for a couple minutes then asked if he needed help, when I turned around the bike was put together. Grandson firgured out how to ride and get off the second time he was on it. Grandson loves his bike!!! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DuchessPaula

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful customer service! I emailed because of the delivery date misinformation sent by mistake from Amazon, but it did arrive on the correct date. Cruzee responded to my email then followed up about order. We are very happy with this bike. It is very cute, great color and fits our 41" boy who just had his third birthday. After a lot of on-line comparisons and reviews ~~ I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this CRUZEE balance bike!! ~~
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for every kid
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 yld son disliked the product cause it didn't have pedals and he didn't enjoy riding it. I don't think it's for every kid out there. I emailed customer service and the email arrived in the seller/buyer section. They pointed out and I am happy they did. I didn't realize it and thought their service is non existent. Make sure your kid tries someone else's before buying.
customer_reviews.author: F. Breitling

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy for todder to pick up
customer_reviews.text: Good light balance bike for toddler. After researching balance bikes for my 2 year old, I chose cruzee over stryder because it is light weight and easier for younger toddlers to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: jkrug

customer_reviews.text: Our 2.5 year old son loves his bike. He took it quickly and is already letting his legs stay up a bit to cruise. His smaller for his age and the frame of this bike allows the seat to go way low for him.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Strong and adjustable and kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter after seeing so many of them while on a trip to Italy. She took right to it and I'm sure it is a better way to introduce a child to a regular two wheel bike in the future. It is light and very well constructed. It will no doubt be a much sought after hand-me-down. It is well designed and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old grandson and he loves it...... light weight.. easy to put together... great buy...
customer_reviews.author: MBurmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Our kid loves it. She can't wait to wake up and be on her bike. Super light to carry it around. We started out with Amazon's choice banana bike which was heavy and defective. Glad that we had to send it back and reconsider our options. We decided to get Cruzee which is expensive but very well made. Had difficulty getting Amazon to ship the right wheel colour.

customer_reviews.title: Nicest bike on our block!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and adjust. Very light, which comes in handy when kiddo decides half a mile away from home that he would rather walk. Also, he can pick it up easily. Good rubber tires that don't need inflating. Good seat and handle bar grips. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit!
customer_reviews.text: We got this bike for our granddaughters third birthday. She absolutely loved it. She was successful on it as soon as she tried it. I was glad we got the lighter bike because she was able to lift it up when she wanted to turn around. It was a huge hit. I think we were all shocked at how quickly she was able to"ride" the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K. Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson who is 2. It is so lightweight even he can lift it! He is just learning and hasn't gotten the hang of it yet but once he does this will be perfect for him. The seat and handlebars easily adjust.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to ride

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bike.

customer_reviews.title: World Class Customer Service

They are the better option over rubber tires with tubes. I am so happy with this purchase , but I'm even happier with the absolutely AMAZING customer service.

customer_reviews.text: Not really. But man, you won't believe how weightless it seems. A very good thing, if you have a little guy. customer_reviews.title: This bike was perfect for my almost 3 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: This bike was perfect for my almost 3 year old grandson. He is the youngest of 4 kids and was not interested in anything with training wheels or a tricycle. He wanted a bike like his older siblings. He took to this bike like a 'duck to water". It is well made and very easily assembled ( no tools required!) It is lightweight so he can carry it around if he so desires! Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bechtold

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but seat is  too hard for sensitive crotch
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking, sturdy and lightweight bike. But my 4 year old can't ride it longer than 5 minutes because the seat is too hard for her crotch. And, she can't ride it the next day without complaining that her crotch is sore. She now rides her bike with training wheels while the Cruzee collects dust in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: S Elenite

customer_reviews.title: This is a great choice for a 1st bike in our experience
customer_reviews.text: My son began riding this at 18 months, and now, at 2 years old can handle it and coast with ease. He LOVES it! I think his success is due in part to the bike being so lightweight. This is a great choice for a 1st bike in our experience!

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment and bike in perfect condition. The bike is beautiful, and easy to assemble. It is every light weight. When my daughter loses her balance, the weight of the bike does not drag her down as easily as other heavier bike.

product_meta.title: Cruzee Ultralite Balance Bike (4.4 lbs) for Ages 1.5 to 5 Years | Aluminum Best Sport Push Bicycle for 2, 3, 4 Year Old Boys & Girls– Toddlers & Kids Skip Tricycles on The Lightest First Bike
product_meta.description: Times are changing and that includes the one thing they say you’ll never forget - learning to ride a bike. Forget how it was done when we were young - tricycles and training wheels are a thing of the past. Today, the best way to learn to ride a bicycle is on a no-pedal balance bike. The Cruzee Ultralite is the lightest, easiest and safest balance bike to teach children to ride. If your child can walk, they can ride a Cruzee. At just 4.4 lbs (2kg), little riders safely develop balance, steering and motor skills as they explore the world on their first bike. The Cruzee Ultralite fits boys and girls from 18 months to 5 years old and will grow with your child. Our rust-free anodized finish, maintenance-free sealed bearings, flat-free composite tires and tool-free adjustment clamps offer kids (and their parents) years of carefree outdoor bike riding adventures. Low profile axle bolts protect riders from painful ankle strikes and make the Cruzee Ultralite the perfect training bike and ride-on toy for indoor fun. It will not damage floor surfaces and your toddler can blow off steam while it is cold and snowy outside. Unlike other balance bikes, Cruzees come in nine Sparkle Sapphire Anodized colors that will mesmerize children and adults alike. With an 11.5 inch minimum seat heigh, the Cruzee Ultralite also includes an extra long seat post that results in wide push bike adjustability. With the Cruzee Ultralite your child will be riding like a pro in no time - order today!
feature_bullets: TRY A DIFFERENT APPROACH TO LEARNING – Skip tricycles and training wheels. On a no-pedal blue Cruzee balance bike children LEARN TO BALANCE FIRST on two wheels. Pedaling on a traditional bike comes easy after learning on a Cruzee.

MAKE A LONG TERM INVESTMENT IN YOUR CHILD’S HAPPINESS – Constructed of rust-free anodized aluminum, Cruzees come with a LIFETIME WARRANTY. Wide seat and handlebar adjustment lets the bike grow with your child deliver as much as 3 years of use.

THE LIGHTEST BALANCE BIKE IN THE WORLD – In cycling, lightweight equals performance & safety. Weighing just 4.4lbs, the Cruzee delivers effortless control & builds confidence in the smallest riders, no matter what terrain they choose to ride.

THERE’S SO MUCH TO LOVE ABOUT CRUZEE - The Cruzee is incredibly comfortable with soft grips, a super comfy seat, low-profile axle bolts & flat-free foam rubber tires. Your child will love it, and you will too!
